snippet: Mr. Trump pointed to President Franklin D. Roosevelt’s actions toward Japanese, German and Italian immigrants during World War II as precedent.
abstract: Donald J Trump defends his call to bar all Muslims from entering United States, incurring criticism across wide political spectrum and support from some on right; Trump invokes Pres Franklin D Roosevelt's classification of Japanese, German and Italian migrants as enemy aliens during World War II in defense of his position.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Julie Hirschfeld Davis, Emmarie Huetteman, Steven Erlanger and Adam Nossiter.

headline.main: Donald Trump Deflects Withering Fire on Muslim Plan
